Desc.entry: A registered charity that organises social activities for middle aged and older people (aged up to 65 years) with physical disabilities in the Stocksbridge area. Provides transport to the centre and refreshments are available. Membership restricted to 16 members due to limitations of the building. Members must be able to manage without personal assistance. Referral via Health Professional.

category.entry: PHYSICAL IMPAIRMENT - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
